title: Catch Joel Live on radio KING FM - Seattle - August 16 Live broadcast on NW FOCUS at 8PM PT - Featuring...

object.content: Catch Joel Live on radio KING FM - Seattle - August 16 Live broadcast on NW FOCUS at 8PM PT - Featuring works of Kirchner, Brahms and Liszt. Including selections from new CD of Music by Leon Kirchner: Revelations. On "Leon Kirchner's last piece, Sonata No. 3, "The Forbidden" ...Fan had been Kirchner's student at Harvard and commissioned the sonata from him. It is full of turbulence, always edging forward, rarely at rest, and the student expressed his teacher's intentions admirably." Gibert Mott, NewsTimes "Praised for his commanding technique and the passion he brings to his performances, Fan has earned accolades from music critics across the continent..."  Marga Lincoln, Independent Record
